programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Rupert & The Treasure Chest - An old Pirate tells Rupert he is searching for the treasure that will raise his sunken ship from the depths. How can Rupert help him?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Rupert & The Magic Show - When Ping Pong's glow-worm trick goes wrong, it's her rival Bill who ends up helping out… with spectacular results.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep23
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Nap Time Story - Topsy is going to read Zebby a naptime story. Raa Raa wants to make the noises to go with the story. But they are all too loud and poor Zebby can't get to sleep. Can Raa Raa find any quiet sleepy noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep24
programme.desc: Go Bananas - Ooo Ooo is having a banana party. Raa Raa and the others have picked masses of lovely bananas, but how are they going to transport them back to Ooo Ooo's in time for the party?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep23
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Winter Games - The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep24
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bucking Bronco - Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep75
programme.desc: Rockabye Stingo - Fifi has lost Cottonsocks, her beloved toy rabbit. She searches the garden for it to no avail. But that couldn't be Stingo cuddling it could it?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep76
programme.desc: Inspector Stingo - Fifi's trowel has gone missing. Stingo decides to take the matter in hand and launch an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Pig Trouble In Little Beanotown - When poor Gnasher is laid up wearing the 'collar of shame' Dennis takes Rasher to school instead and disguises her as an exchange student! What Dennis doesn't expect is that Walter will take a shine to the new girl! But once Walter realises the object of his affections is Rasher he is beyond embarrassed and hatches a revenge plan!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep24
programme.desc: I, Clawdia - I, Clawdia Walter and Clawdia are causing mischief for the gang by framing Gnasher for chewing things he shouldn't! It's only when the mayhem gets out of hand that Dennis smells a rat, or rather a cat! Dennis must catch Clawdia in the act and prove Gnasher's innocence before it's too late!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep38
programme.desc: Begin The Blitz - With Zarkon consumed by his hunt for Lotor, Voltron gathers their coalition and prepares to strike in hopes of demolishing the evil Empire

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep12
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Three - Bullwinkle and Rocky fly to a mysterious monster-inhabited island to meet the missing mad scientist that created the serum that turned Bullwinkle into a monster, only to learn of the biggest, meanest monster on the island, Humongalon

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep12
programme.desc: Curse Of The Cicadas / Beat A Fajita - The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep3
programme.desc: Garage - The Dinotrux builds a garage where the Reptools can be safe, but D-Structs tries to thwart their efforts by pitting them against one another.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.desc: Game Plan - Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.desc: Glitter Loss / New Anthem - When Guy Diamond loses his glitter, he and the Snack Pack embark on an epic journey to the fabled fountain of glitter to get his glitter back./ Poppy decides that it’s time for a new, Bergen-fear-free Troll anthem, so she creates a song competition to see which Troll can write the best new anthem.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep3
programme.desc: Wet Hot Ahhh Valley Summer/Grug Vs The Moon - When Eep and Thunk challenge each other in the first-ever dare-off, Thunk faces the deep end - his greatest fear; Grug picks a fight with the moon.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep28
programme.desc: Where The Koobish Roam / Best Friendiversary - On a Koobish cattle drive together, Tip and Krunkle's differences result in Oh and the herd getting lost in a stampede; Tip and Oh can't agree on how to celebrate their Friendiversary

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Lucky And The Mysterious Map - During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Boo To You - Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep31
programme.desc: Why Leopard Has Spots - You see there was a time when Leopard didn't have spots. All the animals had something special; Lion had his mane, Peacock his beautiful tail, Zebra his stripes… but Leopard was as plain as plain can be. Then one day Leopard made friends with Puff Adder with his bright colourful spots. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep32
programme.desc: Why Hyena Has Short Back Legs - You see there was a time when Hyena didn't have short back legs. He was always chasing around and nipping other animals on the bottom. Then one day the animals had enough. It was time to teach that naughty Hyena a lesson! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep31
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pink Lettuces - Something very strange is happening at the farm – all Farmer Tom's lettuces have been painted pink! Farmer Tom is really upset so Noddy offers to investigate. After talking to PatPat and Smartysaurus he realises that the Ninjas had asked Smartysaurus to make them pink paint so that they could paint the lettuces. They were using them as pom-poms to cheerlead Pink Ninja as she ran the Toyland Marathon Race! The Ninjas are very sorry that they upset Farmer Tom but he tells them that it's alright. They're welcome to his lettuces but next time, they should ask first! The race takes place and Pink Ninja wins! Thanks Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep32
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Jigsaw Puzzle Pieces - When some pieces from Big Ears' jigsaw puzzle go missing, Noddy investigates: where are the missing pieces? He soon realises someone must have taken them and draws up a list of suspects. Having discounted the Pirates and then the Naughticorns, Noddy is baffled. But when Pat-Pat and the Pockets invite him to share a piece of toy cake, Noddy suddenly has a breakthrough: maybe it wasn't one toy who took lots of pieces but lots of toys who each took one piece. Cloppycorn, Deltoid, Smartysaurus and Carlton all admit they took one piece. They didn't think they were doing any harm! Big Ears gets all the missing pieces back and everyone is at last able to enjoy his jigsaw puzzle of Toyland. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep31
programme.desc: Why Are There So Many Ladybirds? - One winter morning Jess finds lots of ladybird in his barn. Why are they there? That's the Big Question! Mimi tells him that she has lots of ladybirds in her garden in the summer. They're always hungry and brilliant for the plants because they eat all the greenfly. Maybe they're looking for greenfly in his barn? Jess doesn't think so. There are no greenfly in the barn. He goes to ask Baa and Billie for help. They're saying goodbye to Little Bird who's flying away to a warmer country for the winter. Jess thinks maybe the ladybirds are gathering to fly away too and rushes back to his barn to say goodbye. But when he gets there he finds that the ladybirds are now all huddled together and fast asleep. What's going on? Jess goes to ask Willow and finds a hedgehog sleeping under some leaves near the stable. Willow explains that some animals find it hard to find food in the winter, especially if they can't store it, so they eat as much as they can and then go to sleep during the winter. It's called hibe

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep32
programme.desc: How Can I Stop Little Bird Eating The Seeds? - Mimi's really upset with Little Bird who keeps eating all her lettuce seeds. Jess wonders how they can stop her. They try putting out extra food for her but Little Bird just eats everything! Jess wonders if covering the seeds with something so that Little Bird can't reach them would work. Mimi says it's a good idea but the sun won't reach the seeds either – which means they won't grow. The only thing that seems to stop t Little Bird is when she sees Jess and is frightened away. But Jess can't stand still in the vegetable patch forever! Willow sees him and tells him he's being a scarecrow. A scarecrow? Yes, something that scares away the birds. Mimi has a brilliant idea to make the perfect scarecrow. A Jess scarecrow. Little Bird stops eating the lettuce seeds and eats from the lovely bird table they put out for her instead. Hooray!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep3
programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Rupert And The Weather Machine - When it starts raining sausages in Nutwood Rupert and friends fly up to the Cloud Shepherd's home to find out what has happened to the weather machine.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep25
programme.desc: Clangy Bangy Crocky - Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. It's great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep26
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S New Noise - Raa Raa wants to find the perfect noise to partner his friend Huffty in a tune. He hears an amazing new noise but does not know what made it… he sets out on a noisy discovery to find out how to recreate this wonderful new noise.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep25
programme.desc: Postman Pat'S Pop Star Rescue - Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous ‘sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep26
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Very Important Person - PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being “Best local Policeman of the year” and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep77

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep163
programme.desc: Mermaidman Begins / Plankton's Good Eye - Mermaidman and Barnacleboy let SpongeBob and Patrick in on their secret, heroic origins! // Using SpongeBob's DNA, Plantkon grows himself a second eye...and becomes nice!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Two of Clubs / Vacation Daze - Ronnie Anne and Sid try their best to look for an after school activity to do together. // When Maria finally gets a day off, Ronnie Anne has to compete with her family for some much-needed quality time.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Lalo Land / Maybe-Sitter - The Casagrandes prepare Lalo for his big audition to be Phoebe Powers' new canine sidekick! // With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Midden Fleasure / Tread or Alive - Fendrich and his gang learn of Cluster's junkyard treasure, but Harl Cluster, Shirley and Tread unite to protect it. // Snake and Daisy take advantage of Tread's competitive nature to get him to unknowingly act as their getaway driver for a heist.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep120
programme.desc: King Cloud vs. Smogzilla / Ranch on the Side - When a malevolent Smog Cloud terrorizes Mt. Middlemost, it's up to Parker to stop it. // Parker becomes obsessed with ranch dressing.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep509
programme.desc: Bathroom Bully - When Miss Smith praises Simon's grades in class, Derek bullies him by not allowing him to use the boys' bathroom.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep510
programme.desc: The Return of Thornbergaupht - Simon's interactive video game is about to take off, until Jeanette reprograms the game's villain.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Squashed - When Alvin dreams of joining a private club, he volunteers Dave to play squash, even though Dave doesn't play.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Writer's Block - When Dave suffers from writer's block, Alvin pretends to write a broadway show, which only makes Dave feel worse.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep206
programme.desc: Unreal Estate / Code Yellow - When SpongeBob thinks he's allergic to his pineapple, Squidward offers to help find him a new home. // Squidward is getting a nose job at the local hospital, and SpongeBob tags along as moral support.

programme.title: Danger Force S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Chapa's Crush - When Danger Force fails a mission because Chapa is distracted by a crush, the gang has to track down her obsession and get their friend back to her normal self.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Time Amok - When The Protostar is fractured in time by an anomaly, Hologram Janeway must synchronize the disjointed crew and save their ship before it destructs.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Stress Test / How to Train Your Carl - The family tries to help Bobby get over his test taking anxieties. // Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Puns and Buns - Benny struggles to rein in Luan and her practical jokes when she becomes his coworker at the Burpin'Burger.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Crashed Course - The Loud siblings intervene when they think Lori is failing out of Fairway U.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep225
programme.desc: The Crying Dame / Anti Social - To get Lily to stop crying the kids give her an old singing toy from the attic but it quickly drives them crazy. // Dad declares war on the kids' devices so they decide to show Dad how great electronics and the internet are.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep70
programme.desc: Chimps Ahoy / Ghost Host - Sandy is worried her inventions won't satisfy her chimp beneficiaries. // The Flying Dutchman crashes at SpongeBob's house where he constantly scares, startles and surprises SpongeBob.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep51
programme.desc: Spongebob's House Party - Spongebob decides to throw a big party after discovering a "how to throw a party" kit in the grocery store.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Box Smusher / Tie-Dye Eye - When multiple packages are found smushed, the Middlemost Post must discover the truth and clear their name. // Parker wakes up one morning with Tie-Dye Eye, and pretty soon, so does the entire mountain.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Heavy Meddle / Making the Case - Lincoln is tired of his sisters meddling in his business until he's being picked on at school. // Lincoln secretly videos his sister's most embarrassing moments in order to win a video contest at school.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Driving Miss Hazy / No Guts, No Glori - Tired of doing favors to get a ride from Lori, Lincoln decides it's time to help Leni pass her driver's test. // Lincoln conspires with the rest of his sisters to overthrow Lori's tyranny as their 'baby'sitter.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Operation Popstar - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to get Yoon Kwan's autograph and Carlota helps Alisa prepare for the Great Lakes City Music Festival!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Strife Coach / Gossip Girl - Ronnie Anne and her friends help get Mrs. Kernicky hired as the new PE coach, but her classes are no joke! // When a Sid secret is leaked at school, Ronnie Anne and Sid wonder if they can continue being best buds!

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Pony, Come Home / Special Sauce - Annie & friends plan a heist to retrieve Pony from the rich kid who thinks he owns him now. // When Gerry adopts a pet rock and starts having Annie and Pony style adventures, they worry that they've lost their "special sauce."

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Plants! / Heston's Coat - Annie and Pony's camping trip is in jeopardy when Pony develops a fear of plants. // Heston loans Annie his brand-new coat on a cold day, but Annie knows it's only a matter of time before Pony ruins it.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep199
programme.desc: Sold! / Lame and Fortune - When SpongeBob and Patrick think their homes have been sold, they move away - much to Squidward’s delight. // When fortune cookies start predicting the future, Plankton realizes he can twist them to his own evil schemes.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep200
programme.desc: Goodbye, Krabby Patty? - Mr. Krabs manufactures Krabby Patties on an industrial scale, but it drives a wedge between SpongeBob and Patrick.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep201
programme.desc: Sandy's Nutmare / Bulletin Board - Sandy creates the latest acorn-based food sensation, but her tree pays the price for her greed. // SpongeBob erects a community bulletin board in the Krusty Krab, but anonymous reviews posted on it lead to trouble.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep202
programme.desc: Food Con Castaways / Snail Mail - The gang heads to a food convention, but things go awry when they become stranded in the woods. // SpongeBob accidentally fibs to his pen pal, but when his friend comes to visit, he must keep the ruse going!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Secret Admirer - When Po's fake love letter prank on Monkey backfires, the duo's relationship is put to the test in a story of jealousy, betrayal and, yes, even kidnapping.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Invitation Only - Po is sad when he learns that everyone has been invited to a dinner party except for him, due to his poor table manners. Will Shifu be able to teach Po proper etiquette AND foil the attack of evil Temutai and his army?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Sozin's Comet Part 2: The Old Masters - The gang find Iroh with June's help. Iroh suggests that Zuko challenge Azula for the position of Fire Lord, with Katara to help. The others decide to intercept the airship fleet.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Stop Bugging Me - Private has to get over his fear of roaches and use them to help him free the other penguins from the grip of Officer X.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Operation: Swap-anzee / Snowmageddon - The Space Agency sends Private to the moon. His ticket is downgraded to one-way and the other birds can't monkey around if they hope to get him home again. // Snowmageddon hits and traps Skipper and Marlene in the convenience store with X.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Tunnel of Love / Skipper Makes Perfect - When a sneeze from Rico causes the underground tunnel system beneath the zoo to rupture Skipper calls in 4 beavers to fix the situation. // Skipper's having one of those perfect days, and he decides to use the opportunity to settle an old score.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Stank Breath / Frog Day Afternoon - Buhdeuce has to deal with some awesomely bad stank breath that leads to some awesomely bad trouble. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce teach their pet Jelly how to fetch, and she accidentally fetches a monster egg.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep103

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Tales Ep4A/Ep7B/Ep10C/Ep11A/Ep17A/Ep21B/Ep26A
programme.desc: Digital Dilemma/Beach Bully Bingo/Polar Peril/Din-O-Sores/Adventures in Penguin Sitting/Endless Bummer/Game of Cat and Mouse - When the antenna of Tom's homemade computer is struck by lightning, Tom and Jerry are zapped inside the computer.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep110/Ep140
programme.desc: First Snow/Night Visitor - Bop and Boo befriend Dwayne the MOOSE in the Snowy Forest. The Bunnies have never played in the snow before! Dwayne thinks they'll love it! But Boo knocks snow from a branch onto her head!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis Ep43/Ep10
programme.desc: A Very Magic Magic Wand/Teatime, Again And Again - Alice turns up in Wonderland with a plastic toy magic wand. So imagine her surprise when she finds out that, in this parallel location, it actually works like a real-life magic wand!

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep210/Ep238
programme.desc: A Very Sleepy Tillie/Starring Simon - It’s time for Tillie to take a nap, but she wants to keEp.playing with her Monstersitters.

programme.title: Monchhichi Tribe Ep121/Ep143
programme.desc: The Prank Contest/Super Willow - Hanae and Willow just can’t stop playing tricks on each other and whoever pulls off the biggest trick will win!

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep110/Ep142
programme.desc: Dino Checkup Hiccup/This Ranch Ain’T Big Enough - After Clover accidentally breaks Min’s statoscope and tries to hide the evidence, he learns that he should never be afraid to tell Min when he makes a mistake.

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep343/Ep310
programme.desc: Connect The Dots In Big Sky Park/Noisy Neighbours In Big Sky Park - Rob wants to see constellations in the sky so Mom suggests a camp out at night.

programme.title: Mush Mush And The Mushables Ep109/Ep127
programme.desc: Mushroomates/The Breathtaking Bolly Show - When ants invade Fung and Miff’s tree, our Mushlers offer for them to move in… but the two quickly turn out to be unbearable roommates.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep5B/Ep58B/Ep109B/Ep16A/Ep68B/Ep120A/Ep26A

Now he needs to gather some luck or he'll never get home.

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep11/Ep42

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep8/Ep18/Ep30/Ep42/Ep54/Ep65/Ep76

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Theatricals Ep16/Ep59/Ep80/Ep117/Ep8/Ep124/Ep15/Ep38
programme.desc: Cruise Cat/Love that Pup/Pet Peeve/Tops with Pops/Busy Buddies/Unshrinkable Jerry Mouse/Cat Napping/Hic-Cup Pup - Tom is ordered by a ship captain to keEp.the boat free of mice.

programme.title: Pat The Dog Ep58/Ep59/Ep255/Ep256/Ep263/Ep258/Ep259/Ep260
programme.desc: Tirouli/Photo-Bomb/Sewers Hideout/Pat Needs A Nap/Lost Dog/Last Minute/The Best Tomorrow Of Our Lives/Hoodie Express - While playing with Pat and Hoodie, Lola hears a beautiful bird sound. She looks in her dad's ornithology book and finds out the bird is actually a parrot.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep92/Ep46/Ep10/Ep31/Ep71
programme.desc: Brain Trust/Kitty & Hawk/Wishing Well/Brawl Bot/Welcome To The Unikingdom - Dr. Fox accidentally transports the gang inside her brain, where they must control her movements to complete a dangerous experiment.

programme.title: Chowder Ep5B/Ep26B/Ep15B/Ep45B

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep110/Ep151/Ep196/Ep131/Ep171
programme.desc: Man Up/You’re a Good Man, Mojo Jojo/Can't Buy Love/The Secret Life of Blossom Powerpuff/Tooth Or Consequences - When Man-Boy returns to exact his revenge, Buttercup must embrace the balance between punching and hugging in order to defeat him.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep111/Ep150/Ep190/Ep212/Ep246
programme.desc: Villain Time/Animorphosis/Big In Japan/The Bentathlon/Cosplay Day - Ben must turn alien to save the Hoover Dam from disaster, but when tough guy hero Tim Buktu swoops in to "help", Ben must figure out if Tim is friend or foe.

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep23/Ep11

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep12/Ep24

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep5
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.
